description: Enable seamless searching and browsing of your Plex media libraries through an MCP server. Authenticate securely with Plex via OAuth or static tokens and retrieve rich metadata for movies, shows, music, playlists, and more. Manage your Plex content efficiently with comprehensive tools for playlists, collections, and media information.

plexToken.description: Plex authentication token (optional - can authenticate interactively)

plexVerifySsl.description: Whether to verify Plex server SSL certificate

capabilities.name: search_plex
capabilities.description: Search for movies, TV shows, and other content in Plex libraries

capabilities.name: browse_libraries
capabilities.description: List all available Plex libraries (Movies, TV Shows, Music, etc.)

capabilities.name: browse_library
capabilities.description: Browse content within a specific Plex library with filtering and sorting options

capabilities.name: get_recently_added
capabilities.description: Get recently added content from Plex libraries

capabilities.name: get_watch_history
capabilities.description: Get playback history for the Plex server

capabilities.name: get_on_deck
capabilities.description: Get 'On Deck' items (continue watching) for users

capabilities.name: list_playlists
capabilities.description: List all playlists on the Plex server

capabilities.name: browse_playlist
capabilities.description: Browse and view the contents of a specific playlist with full track metadata

capabilities.name: create_playlist
capabilities.description: Create a new regular playlist on the Plex server. Requires an initial item (item_key parameter) to be created successfully. Smart playlists are not supported due to their complex filter requirements.

capabilities.name: add_to_playlist
capabilities.description: Add items to an existing playlist

capabilities.name: delete_playlist
capabilities.description: Delete an existing playlist

capabilities.name: get_watched_status
capabilities.description: Check watch status and progress for specific content items

capabilities.name: get_collections
capabilities.description: List all collections available on the Plex server

capabilities.name: browse_collection
capabilities.description: Browse content within a specific collection

capabilities.name: get_media_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed technical information about media files (codecs, bitrates, file sizes, etc.)

capabilities.name: get_library_stats
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive statistics about Plex libraries (storage usage, file counts, content breakdown, etc.)

capabilities.name: get_listening_stats
capabilities.description: Get detailed listening statistics and music recommendations based on play history and patterns

capabilities.name: discover_music
capabilities.description: Natural language music discovery with smart recommendations based on your preferences and library

capabilities.name: authenticate_plex
capabilities.description: Initiate Plex OAuth authentication flow to get user login URL

capabilities.name: check_auth_status
capabilities.description: Check if Plex authentication is complete and retrieve the auth token

capabilities.name: clear_auth
capabilities.description: Clear stored authentication credentials

capabilities.name: validate_llm_response
capabilities.description: Validate LLM response format and content against expected schemas for different prompt types
